SELECT sn FROM scs_dish_robot_ref WHERE valid = 1
AND sn LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sn},'%')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.id , IFNULL(a.valid = 1, 0) AS checked,u.id AS robot_id, u.valid AS STATUS,u.sn AS sn,i.name AS dish_name,u.type AS TYPE,a.date_create,a.date_update FROM (SELECT * FROM cms_robot WHERE valid=1) AS u LEFT JOIN scs_dish_robot_ref AS a ON u.sn = a.sn LEFT JOIN scs_dish_info AS i ON i.id = a.dish_id AND a.sn = #{sn}) AS tbl
AND tbl.sn LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{sn}), '%')
AND tbl.type_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{type_name}), '%')
ORDER BY tbl.checked DESC;
